textarena.wrappers.ObservationWrappers package¶

Submodules¶

textarena.wrappers.ObservationWrappers.llm_observation_wrapper module¶

class textarena.wrappers.ObservationWrappers.llm_observation_wrapper.LLMObservationWrapper(env: Env)[source]¶

Bases: ObservationWrapper

A wrapper for converting environment observations into formatted strings suitable for large language models (LLMs). It ensures that duplicate observations are not added to the full observations.

observation(player_id: int, observation: dict[int, List[Tuple[int, str]]] | None)[source]¶
